Weapon.Name: Photon Blade
Weapon.Description: A sleek, energy-based sword that hums with raw power, designed for the Rogue Automaton class.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: With a swift motion, the blade cuts through the air, electrifying the target.

Weapon.Name: Mechanical Bow
Weapon.Description: An advanced compound bow with mechanized draw strength settings for precise shots.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The arrow flies true, hitting its mark with mechanical precision.

Weapon.Name: Viral Injector
Weapon.Description: A sinister weapon used to inject enemies with a rapidly spreading nanite virus.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The dagger releases a cloud of nanites, consuming the enemy from within.
